reviewText: Great purchase experience...arrived much earlier than expected.  Perfect video for little boys who can't get enough of 'garbage trucks'...it's educational too!
My son's name is Charlie and he loves trash trucks, to buying this was a no-brainer.  He really enjoys it and asks to watch it often.  Great for any boy who loves trash trucks!

This is a great little DVD for kids.  My grandson, Jacob just loves this show and asks me to put it on each time he comes to visit; sometimes three and four times that day.  It also has lots of good info on recycling; how to separate your items and how the whole recycling process works.  Very informative for little minds.  Great!
